text: Bruto Buozzi (26 May 1885 - 16 March 1937) was an Italian gymnast. He competed in the men's team event at the 1908 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1885 births Category:1937 deaths Category:Italian male artistic gymnasts Category:Olympic gymnasts of Italy Category:Gymnasts at the 1908 Summer Olympics Category:People from Ferrara
title: Bruto Buozzi
